text: is a former Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Okimune was born in Hiroshima Prefecture on September 7, 1959. After graduating from Hiroshima Technical High School, he joined Japan Soccer League Division 1 club Fujitsu in 1978. However in first season, the club was relegated to Division 2. He retired end of 1988/89 season. In August 1979, Okimune was selected the Japan U-20 national team for 1979 World Youth Championship. He played 3 games. On August 30, 1981, he debuted for the Japan national team against Malaysia. He played 2 games for Japan in 1981. ==Statistics== Japan National Football Team Database |- |1981||2||0 |- !Total||2||0 |} ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Hiroshima Prefecture Category:Japan international footballers Category:Japan Soccer League players Category:Kawasaki Frontale players
title: Toshihiko Okimune
